revealed_truths.truth: Miguel accepts the mantle of traitor
A path emerges in Serephis for Miguel
The air in Serephis changes, carrying the scent of ozone and wet stone
Miguel discovers the Impossible Grove in Serephis
The trees in the Impossible Grove cast no shadows, violating a law of reality
The wind in Serephis abruptly dies, replaced by an absolute silence around the Impossible Grove

objectives.objective: Seek an answer to the spiritual wound and become whole again
Definitively choose to proceed alone on his personal quest, prioritizing it over his duties as Supreme Commander

combat_actions.action: steps across the threshold into the Impossible Grove
